tool.name: mw2isatab
tool.description: A tool to obtain an ISA document from NIH Metabolomics Workbench
tool.command: mkdir study_dir && mkdir -p '${output.files_path}' && $__tool_directory__/mw2isatab.py "$mw_study_id" study_dir && \ cp study_dir/mw_study_id/* $output.extra_files_path/

param.name: mw_study_id
param.label: Metabolomics Workbench Study Identifier
param.help: MW study ID available at Metabolomics Workbench, e.g. ST000110.

tool.help:
============================================ Get ISA metadata from Metabolomics Workbench ============================================
This tool produces an ISA-Tab archive (zip) given an NIH Metabolomics Workbench accession number. See http://www.metabolomicsworkbench.org/
----- Input -----
Metabolomics Workbench Study Identifier ======================================= MW study ID available at Metabolomics Workbench, e.g. ST000110.
------ Output ------
ISA-Tab history item ==================== The output ISA-Tab history item will contain the i_*.txt, s_*.txt and a_*.txt files expected. The output also includes auto-generated Metabolite Assignment Files (MAF).
For details on the ISA-Tab format, please see http://isa-specs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/isatab.html
